subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Hotel de Paris (Mon): A luxurious family-friendly hotel offering spacious rooms, beautiful gardens, and a variety of activities for children. The elegant decor and attentive service ensure a comfortable stay for families.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Le Safari (Nice): Located in the heart of the old town, this restaurant offers a diverse menu with options for both adults and children. The lively setting and outdoor seating make it a great spot for a family meal.

- Language : While French is the official language, English is widely spoken in tourist areas. Learning a few basic French phrases can enhance your travel experience. subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Hotel Hermitage Monte-Carlo (Monaco): A luxurious hotel set in a historic chateau, offering elegant rooms, a spa, and breathtaking views of the Mediterranean. The refined ambiance and top-tier services make it a standout choice for luxury accommodations.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Mercantour National Park : Explore picturesque villages and rolling hills, famous for lavender fields and vineyards.
